sentences.english: ChiMi hui offered to and u-know feelings, let u-know completed more wisdom side back.
sentences.chinese: 池謐惠提出要和允浩完畢感情，讓允浩回到多智身邊。

sentences.english: "The risks were no greater than what you would expect to see with any surgery, " Wheatley says.
sentences.chinese: “手術預期風險並不比其他任何手術大，”惠特利說。

sentences.english: Wheeldon is emphatically one of the lucky ones.
sentences.chinese: 惠爾登顯然是那些幸運兒中的一個。

sentences.english: You will also want to visit the Wheelwright Museum of The American Indian.
sentences.chinese: 你也會想要參觀美國印第安人惠賴特博物館。

sentences.english: Well, after a brief look at this ancient city.
sentences.chinese: 好了，看過了惠遠古城的風貌之後呢。

sentences.english: "We now need to accelerate our progress, " said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 惠塔克說，我們現在需要加快進程。

sentences.english: Wheelwright displays works of all Native American cultures.
sentences.chinese: 惠賴特博物館展出所有美國土著人文化的作品。

sentences.english: The line went dead. Whitlock replaced the receiver.
sentences.chinese: 線路中斷了，惠特洛克把聽筒放回原處。

sentences.english: But, you know, when I saw you with Whit…
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡它我很高興，陳惠。

sentences.english: I'm happy you like it, Chen Hui.
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡它我很高興，陳惠。

sentences.english: In non-preferential environment, how much social economic cost does it have?
sentences.chinese: 非稅惠環境下存在怎樣的社會經濟成本？

sentences.english: We will be grateful if you send us an early favorable reply to our new arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 若蒙早日惠復我方新安排，將不勝感謝。

definition: to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
